parameters.name: FaultAddrPool
parameters.description: The list of faulty address pools.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description: The language in which you want the values of some response parameters to be returned. These response parameters support multiple languages.

parameters.description: The name of the disaster recovery plan.
